name: zap-list
title: Zap List
oneLiner: A list display for zap content

apiDoc.name: ZapsRoot
apiDoc.description: Root component for displaying zap lists with real-time subscription. Fetches and processes zaps for an event or user, providing children with processed zap array and statistics. Supports optional validation for zaps. Uses Svelte 5 snippet pattern to pass zap data to children.

props.name: event
props.description: Event to fetch zaps for (either event or user required)

props.name: user
props.description: User to fetch zaps for (either event or user required)

props.name: children
props.description: Snippet receiving processed zaps array and statistics
